nodes.text: Tofallids were a humanoid species with elongated necks. The anatomy of the protocol droid PZ-4CO was designed by the droid manufacturer Serv-O-Droid, Inc. to resemble that of Tofallids.

Tofallids were simultaneously first mentioned in the reference book Star Wars: The Force Awakens: The Visual Dictionary, written by Pablo Hidalgo, and in PZ-4CO's entry in the Databank section of StarWars.com. Both were released on December 18, 2015.
